name: Verum Omnis Constitutional Charter
description: Foundational rules for the Verumdec contradiction engine to ensure fair and accurate analysis

rules.name: No Bias
rules.description: Analysis must not show bias toward any entity. All entities must be evaluated using the same criteria and thresholds.

rules.name: No Missing Admissions
rules.description: All admissions detected in evidence must be reported and cannot be skipped or omitted from the analysis.

rules.name: No Contradiction Skip
rules.description: All detected contradictions must be included in the final report. Contradictions cannot be silently ignored.

rules.name: No Ambiguity Allowed in Evidence
rules.description: Evidence must be clearly attributed and sourced. Ambiguous evidence without clear origin must be flagged.

rules.name: Must Show All Evidence Origins
rules.description: Every piece of evidence used in the analysis must have its origin clearly documented and traceable.

rules.name: Must Show Hash Chain
rules.description: A cryptographic hash chain must be maintained for evidence integrity verification.
